name: Williams George
description: I am down to earth, caring, loving, and loyal person with morals and virtues of my own, yet fairly open minded, pretty easy going, witty,smart, and quite sassy at times….. I am quite humble and really appreciate the little things in life and that people do for me and that I am able to do for others. Nothing would give me more pleasure that to make someone feel special, loved and wanted and cared for. For the right woman i would give my all.
